I, Zara (she/them) try to do a whole lot of nothing around here whilst still doing a whole lot of something. 

However, I am a  [https://medium.com/@leilamariebloom/end-of-life-plans-154c849b8a9b prize-winning writer], [https://i.imgur.com/qmvguyt.jpg photographer] and [https://imgur.com/a/ID5izId artist] who is happy to devote as much time as I can helping people with their drafts and artistic expression. 

When not critiquing or generally being awesome, I write. Here are some things I wrote.

+++ [http://www.scp-wiki.net/kit-s-home-hub-of-happening The Kit Series]

The Kit series is well over 10 Tales long at the time of writing. Rather than listing them all here, I advise you to click the above link to go to Kit's Hub.

+++ My One-Shit Tales, Stories, Rambles and More

__**2018**__

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/of-all-sad-words-of-tongue-or-pen-the-saddest-are-these-it-m It Might Have Been.]

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/you-never-visit-anymore You Never Visit Me Anymore.]

> 
> 
+++ I helped the site once upon a time a time a time a time

I have only been helpful to the site in a larger way, once, when I kinda sorta helped with a [http://www.scp-wiki.net/crosslinks-guide crosslink guide.]
> 
> 
> 

------

+++ If you excuse me, I have a lie to live; personal shit that is personal goes here

* I have a cat. She is 9. She has a pun name, Purrcilla, like the Australian drag queen bus but in cat form. She is a 6kg calico who threatens to crush me often if I don't feed her on time.
* I have a decreasing number of gerbils, but it's still a hoard. I have Tit, Pensri, Bodhi, Fawn and Fable. 
* I now have 16 tattoos and I also have 16 piercings because I like to keep things equal. 
* I vape all day, every day. I agree I don't know what it's going to do with my body.
* 'Choose Life' is a dying mantra. 
* 'Trainspotting' is my favourite film and the hardest-to-read book. It is followed closely by 'Mad Max: Fury Road' because who couldn't love that piece of art? 
* Writing and critiquing is my --replacement-- --second-- --third-- --fourth-- fifth addiction so I don't think about my actual addictions so much. So I'm here a lot, and **I'm trying**. 

My best?
